text: "Too Much Sauce" is a single by American disk jockey DJ Esco, released on August 19, 2016, by A1 Records, Freebandz and Epic Records, as the lead single from his mixtape Project E.T. (2016). The song, which was produced by Zaytoven, features vocals from American rappers Future and Lil Uzi Vert. ==Music video== The music video for "Too Much Sauce", directed by Rick Nyce, was released on October 14, 2016 on DJ Esco's Vevo account. ==Commercial performance== The single peaked at number 50 on the US Billboard Hot 100. It is DJ Esco's only and highest-charting single. The song was certified Platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA) for earning 1,000,000 equivalent units in the United States. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2016–2017) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2016) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs (Billboard) | 91 |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2017) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs (Billboard) | 100 |} ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2016 songs Category:2016 singles Category:American hip hop songs Category:Trap music songs Category:Lil Uzi Vert songs Category:Future (rapper) songs Category:Songs written by Future (rapper) Category:Songs written by Lil Uzi Vert Category:Songs written by Zaytoven Category:Song recordings produced by Zaytoven
title: Too Much Sauce
